description: The Amasa Back Trail follows the Cliff Hanger 4x4 road. This is a somewhat technical bike trail; mostly on dirt and slick rock; steep climbs and loose rock.While the majority of this trail follows a jeep trail there are some single track sections. Be prepared to wait on and pass jeeps in the more technical areas.
directions: Head out of Moab on Kane Creek Blvd. Head south 6.5 km from where the road swings south and starts to follow the river. The trail head is well marked.
title: Amasa Back
